description: An animated film explaining how drugs acting on the nervous system affect the body, emphasising the danger of indiscriminate use of common drugs taking aspirin as an example. Discusses the harmful effects of narcotics, stimulants and depressants and hallucinogens. Suitable for children aged from 13 years onwards.
